column4: is it whise to install a 64 bits linux version (on a E7400 dual core cpu) or is it beter to install a 32 bits version ? the system has got 4 gigs of ram
with 32 bits, you may not get all the RAM visible under the OS
although you may not even need 4 gigs, depending on what you're going to do
i'd also recommend using virtual box's own repo for vbox packages, it seems more up to date last time i checked
